# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

1. **This preliminary site survey was conducted in and around La Paz, Bolivia from October 15 to October 19, 1979 by Special Agents Possanza, Kruchko, Christopher, and RSO Blystone.**

2. **Itinerary:** The Secretary's itinerary is as follows:

1645 - Arrival El Alto International Airport La Paz. Agents note: Press accompanying Secretary will depart by rear entrance of aircraft, circle side of plane away from terminal to join press corps positioned at left of plane for photographs. (GOB does not plan for arrival statements, welcoming or press interviews).

1650 - Ambassador Boeker and Bolivian Director General of State Protocol Ernesto Ruiz Rada board plane to invite Secretary and Mrs. Vance to disembark.

1655 - Secretary and Mrs. Vance disembark and are greeted by welcoming delegation.

Americans:
Mrs. Paul H. Boeker
DCM and Mrs. Alexander F. Watson

Bolivians:
Minister of Foreign Affairs and Mrs. Gustavo Fernandez
MFA Sub-Secretary Alfredo Otero Calderon
MFA Director of Protocol Carlos Costa Durels

1700 - Secretary and Mrs. Vance proceed to vehicles for departure.

1705 - Depart airport for Ambassador's residence.

1740 - Arrive residence.

1830 - Light supper at the residence. Evening free.

Sunday, October 21

0900 - Breakfast at residence.

Remainder of day free. Ambassador and Mrs. Boeker will be available to escort the Secretary and Mrs. Vance on any program of activities they may subsequently determine.

1720 - Assistant Secretary Vaky departs Sheraton for residence to join Secretary of State.

1745 - Secretary Vance, Asst Secretary Vaky and Ambassador Boeker depart residence for a call on President Walter Guevara Arze.

1755 - Arrive Government Palace.

1800 - Call on President Guevara.

1845 - Depart Government Palace for residence of F.M. Fernandez. (Evening dinner).

1900 - Arrive Ambassador's residence.

2015 - Depart Ambassador's residence for residence of F.M. Fernandez.

2030 - Arrive F.M. residence.

2300 - Depart F.M. Fernandez.
2300 - Arrive at the residence.

Monday, October 22

0800 - Breakfast at the residence.

0850 - Depart residence to join motorcade at Hotel Sheraton.

0900 - Arrive at Sheraton Hotel. (Motorcades will depart for Government Palace. According to order of precedence).

0915 - (Approx) Arrive Government Palace.

1000 - (Approx) Depart Palace for Sheraton Hotel. (Time permitting Secretary may wish to proceed to residence before inaugural session at the Sheraton).

1050 - (Approx) Secretary arrive Sheraton.

1100 - Inaugural session of OASGA.

1230 - (Approx) Inaugural session ends.

1245 - (Approx) Secretary's motorcade departs for residence.

1255 - Arrive residence. Lunch open.

1530 - Bilateral with F.M. Uribe of Colombia at Ambassador's residence.

1620 - Motorcade departs for Sheraton.

1630 - Arrives Sheraton Hotel for first plenary meeting of OASGA.

1800 - (Approx) Session concludes, Secretary's motorcade proceeds to residence.

1810 - (Approx) Motorcade arrives residence.

1930 - Light snack to be offered in view of late
